title: Soumkine Notebooks
description:
For almost 20 years I work as an illustrator and graphic designer. 
Each new project starts with sketches in my notebooks. To record any idea you need a good support to write or sketch out.

Over this time I have tried all kinds of notebooks; everything from cheap school notepads to premium class diaries. One day I realised no notebooks existed to meet these conditions, so I created my own. The Soumkine Notebook.

Furthermore, I created a stationery company Soumkine Notebooks that focuses on high quality hand-made notebooks with premium paper.

Soumkine — It's my last name in the French manner. It pronounces as [sum’kin].

P.S. Next time I will tell more about the Soumkine identity and especially about the logo. But today I can't wait to present the last collection of "A5 Slim" notebooks. By the way, they are all available in our online shop Soumkine.com, so don't miss out!

title: Litha
description:
To mark this years transition into Midsummer I released my new print 'Litha'.

The Summer Solstice (also referred to as Litha in the Pagan calendar) marks the longest day of the year and the time when nature is in full bloom. 'Litha' embodies the plant kingdom reaching it's peak, in full fragrant abundance, an overflowing cornucopia of winding branches, sinuous leaves and unfurling flowers.

This is a limited edition print of 20 only. Signed & numbered by myself and embossed with my unique artists stamp.

title: Sketch Sitemapping User Flow Template
description: Design sitemaps and user flows quickly in Sketch using a flexible template. Choose from over 65 layouts and page templates that will keep your sitemaps looking fresh. Connect your pages using pre-made arrows, and make it your own with annotations, descriptions, and labels. With this pre-designed but completely customizable template, you can change text styles and colors easily from a single place to apply automatically throughout the entire file.

title: London
description:
First and foremost: I am not a type designer per se. I create fonts only in order to incorporate them to my designs.

Nevertheless, I have been often required to release them as functional fonts; so much that I had to give in, and I've started converting some.

London is the first one. It is inspired by and based upon the classic Bodoni (Black MT), with major adjustments on the loops, ears, spurs and overall width.

title: Gin Gin, Slovakia's premium spirit
description:
Gin Gin is a new premium spirit coming from the heart of Europe – Slovakia. 
The basis of the gin is found in seven main ingredients –  Limeflower, Elderflower, Breckland Thyme, Juniper Berries, Gentian, Quince and Norwegian Angelica.
Gin is available in selected retail locations in Slovakia, follow the brand on the website and instagram for more information on availability in online stores.

title: The only thing you can do during this season is to draw
Thrives
description:
Thrives is a search engine for social networks that helps you find most recent public content that matters to you.

Wether you are interested in current topics, finding certain posts by your friends. Or you just want to access your own social data.

Thrives helps you do all this in one place.

title: "Berlin at Sea"
description:
With our latest work we explore the act of observation and imaginary experiences. 

“Berlin at Sea” is something that will never be, a dream of Illusionous moments fueling our imagination.

Footwear as an experience not as a product.

Asking and answering questions such as:
What is a product?
Where is the border between art and commerce, is there one?
How much are we influenced by our habits and by the peer pressure created by the environment around us?
What is product fetishism?
How do we push the limits of a product, not only its basic functional experience/existence?
Half art / half commercial item - the project focuses on giving to the public an experience of a concept product that provokes observation and thinking.

The clash of the two, Berlin and the sea, is to take the observer to a distant imaginary place where reality does not exist and one is free to think, experience and feel as he/she pleases.

title: Adobe Photoshop Sketch

title: OPPO F7
description: OPPO approached us to create a promotional film for their F7 series phone, coinciding with a broader commercial campaign. When we saw that the unusually cinematic brief contained style references from Blade Runner, Elysium and District 9 we couldn't wait to get started. The challenge was to strike a balance between the stark, uncompromising style of the reference material and the beautifully refined design elements that lay at the core of the product.

title: HVMN Ketone

title: Savse Get The Glow Illustration
description:
It was great to collaborate with Tom Hardy and team to create a special limited edition design for award winning cold-pressed smoothie brand Savse.

I was commissioned to illustrate a portrait of health coach, author and chef Madeline Shaw who collaborated with the brand and here you can see the results.

I worked closely with the creative team on a number of artworks before we decided on the final image that graced the health conscious tasty juice.

title: A is van Os: about the history of our alphabet
description:
Anyone who can read knows the 26 letters of our alphabet. But where do those letters come from? How long do they exist? And who designed them? Autobahn and Bette Westera take you back to the time of our distant ancestors, who made a drawing if they wanted to 'write' something. Slowly but surely, their drawings changed into the first letters. If you look closely, you can recognize our current alphabet. 
And guess  what? A is not for Apple at all, but for Ox! After reading this book you will understand how this came to be. You will also understand why, whenever we send each other emoji's, we actually do the same as our distant ancestors over 5000 years ago. An educational and special letter book for all ages!

title: Historic Provo Tabernacle in Letterpress Type
description: The historic Provo Tabernacle re-imagined as if designed entirely with type. Crafted character by character. Letterpress printed.

title: In My World
description:
One in four of us will be affected by mental or neurological disorders at some point in our lives. These illnesses are exacerbated for people living in adverse conditions like severe poverty, conflict and war. In these communities, treatment is scarce and the ill are often stigmatized or worse, imprisoned for fear of their affliction.

For the In My World campaign, Witness Change founder and acclaimed photographer, Robin Hammond, traveled to Lebanon, South Sudan, Togo and Madagascar to document the stories of people living in environments that compromise their mental health, from prisons and refugee camps to impoverished and war-torn communities.

See live site:
http://www.onedayinmyworld.com/

Join our tribe of passionate font engineers, academicians, technologists and industry leaders from across the globe to learn, discuss and develop the tools and techniques that matter to you.

title: The Anatomy of Small Ear Squid
GQ瀟灑調酒2：不可能研發室
description:
「GQ瀟灑調酒2：不可能研發室」，是GQ團隊「Good Drink」(G.D.)計劃中的最新作品，與Glenfiddich格蘭菲迪酒廠獨家合作，一起找來三位年輕有為的世界級冠軍調酒師，包括GN詹佳恩、Victor楊宜賓與Jeffrey張勳進，以「不可能的調酒」為主題，將吧台變成「Why Not Lab」研發室，耗費近一年時間，創作出三款從食材、風味、香氣到質感，都充滿驚奇的手工瓶裝調酒。

J4－偽裝成茶的酒／張勳進 Jeffrey Chang  2014年World Class台灣區冠軍
V5－用喝的香水／楊宜賓 Victor Yang  2013年World Class台灣區冠軍
G6－杯子裡的早餐／詹佳恩 GN CHAN  2016年Bacardi Legacy Cocktail Competition世界冠軍

不可能研發室
在這三款全新瀟灑調酒中，三位調酒師們以來自蘇格蘭的格蘭菲迪15年單一麥芽威士忌、台灣本土釀造廠Spring Vodka的琴酒、蘭姆酒與伏特加，再加入各種天然食材與烈酒調製而成；而為了凸顯挑戰不可能的實驗精神，本次的調酒瓶身更特地找來致力於推廣綠能回收玻璃的「春池玻璃」，以超過30%的回收玻璃材質、半手工製程，訂製出實驗與時髦感兼具的全新瓶身。

以台灣三位世界級冠軍調酒師研發出不可能的“色、香、味”調酒為出發點，將老藥罐與古老的實驗鍊金術繪畫，帶進這次的主要視覺概念

title: PURITAAN
description: The Anthracite Collection is based on integrated forms and even smoother details while keeping our signature über-minimalist style. The new design takes advantage of an even better use of the opportunities provided by digital design and manufacturing technology combined with traditional hand-crafting. Our new high-gloss premium quality leather is more durable and more flexible with clean and natural patterns.

title: Mitikal
description: Exploring the mystical stories from the Greek, inspired by illustrations found on antique pottery. This is my ongoing passion project.

title: The only thing you can do during this season is to draw
Thrives
description:
Thrives is a search engine for social networks that helps you find most recent public content that matters to you.

Wether you are interested in current topics, finding certain posts by your friends. Or you just want to access your own social data.

Thrives helps you do all this in one place.

title: "Berlin at Sea"
description:
With our latest work we explore the act of observation and imaginary experiences. 

“Berlin at Sea” is something that will never be, a dream of Illusionous moments fueling our imagination.

Footwear as an experience not as a product.

Asking and answering questions such as:
What is a product?
Where is the border between art and commerce, is there one?
How much are we influenced by our habits and by the peer pressure created by the environment around us?
What is product fetishism?
How do we push the limits of a product, not only its basic functional experience/existence?
Half art / half commercial item - the project focuses on giving to the public an experience of a concept product that provokes observation and thinking.

The clash of the two, Berlin and the sea, is to take the observer to a distant imaginary place where reality does not exist and one is free to think, experience and feel as he/she pleases.

title: Adobe Photoshop Sketch
description: Express yourself anywhere with Photoshop Sketch, Adobe's drawing app for the iPad that gives you natural drawing tools and custom brushes. Sketch is connected to Behance for inspiration and feedback on your work.

title: ++P$¥CH0$3R13++
description: Personal illustration 2017 by Luis Toledo LaPrisaMata

title: OPPO F7
description: OPPO approached us to create a promotional film for their F7 series phone, coinciding with a broader commercial campaign. When we saw that the unusually cinematic brief contained style references from Blade Runner, Elysium and District 9 we couldn't wait to get started. The challenge was to strike a balance between the stark, uncompromising style of the reference material and the beautifully refined design elements that lay at the core of the product.

title: HVMN Ketone
description: Created graphics for HVMN Ketone. HVMN Ketone is a clinically validated superfuel that can be used to improve training, recovery, and performance.  This product was born out of collaboration between HVMN and TΔS Ltd and $60 million in research funding.

title: Savse Get The Glow Illustration
description:
It was great to collaborate with Tom Hardy and team to create a special limited edition design for award winning cold-pressed smoothie brand Savse.

I was commissioned to illustrate a portrait of health coach, author and chef Madeline Shaw who collaborated with the brand and here you can see the results.

I worked closely with the creative team on a number of artworks before we decided on the final image that graced the health conscious tasty juice.

title: A is van Os: about the history of our alphabet
description:
Anyone who can read knows the 26 letters of our alphabet. But where do those letters come from? How long do they exist? And who designed them? Autobahn and Bette Westera take you back to the time of our distant ancestors, who made a drawing if they wanted to 'write' something. Slowly but surely, their drawings changed into the first letters. If you look closely, you can recognize our current alphabet. 
And guess  what? A is not for Apple at all, but for Ox! After reading this book you will understand how this came to be. You will also understand why, whenever we send each other emoji's, we actually do the same as our distant ancestors over 5000 years ago. An educational and special letter book for all ages!

title: Historic Provo Tabernacle in Letterpress Type
description: The historic Provo Tabernacle re-imagined as if designed entirely with type. Crafted character by character. Letterpress printed.

ThinkApps powers top Silicon Valley startups and enterprise companies exploring the cutting edge."

title: In My World
description:
One in four of us will be affected by mental or neurological disorders at some point in our lives. These illnesses are exacerbated for people living in adverse conditions like severe poverty, conflict and war. In these communities, treatment is scarce and the ill are often stigmatized or worse, imprisoned for fear of their affliction.

For the In My World campaign, Witness Change founder and acclaimed photographer, Robin Hammond, traveled to Lebanon, South Sudan, Togo and Madagascar to document the stories of people living in environments that compromise their mental health, from prisons and refugee camps to impoverished and war-torn communities.

See live site:
http://www.onedayinmyworld.com/

description: TYPO Labs font technology conference, hosted in the heart of Kreuzberg at Forum Factory. Join our tribe of passionate font engineers, academicians, technologists and industry leaders from across the globe to learn, discuss and develop the tools and techniques that matter to you.

title: The Anatomy of Small Ear Squid
GQ瀟灑調酒2：不可能研發室
description:
「GQ瀟灑調酒2：不可能研發室」，是GQ團隊「Good Drink」(G.D.)計劃中的最新作品，與Glenfiddich格蘭菲迪酒廠獨家合作，一起找來三位年輕有為的世界級冠軍調酒師，包括GN詹佳恩、Victor楊宜賓與Jeffrey張勳進，以「不可能的調酒」為主題，將吧台變成「Why Not Lab」研發室，耗費近一年時間，創作出三款從食材、風味、香氣到質感，都充滿驚奇的手工瓶裝調酒。

J4－偽裝成茶的酒／張勳進 Jeffrey Chang  2014年World Class台灣區冠軍
V5－用喝的香水／楊宜賓 Victor Yang  2013年World Class台灣區冠軍
G6－杯子裡的早餐／詹佳恩 GN CHAN  2016年Bacardi Legacy Cocktail Competition世界冠軍

不可能研發室
在這三款全新瀟灑調酒中，三位調酒師們以來自蘇格蘭的格蘭菲迪15年單一麥芽威士忌、台灣本土釀造廠Spring Vodka的琴酒、蘭姆酒與伏特加，再加入各種天然食材與烈酒調製而成；而為了凸顯挑戰不可能的實驗精神，本次的調酒瓶身更特地找來致力於推廣綠能回收玻璃的「春池玻璃」，以超過30%的回收玻璃材質、半手工製程，訂製出實驗與時髦感兼具的全新瓶身。

以台灣三位世界級冠軍調酒師研發出不可能的“色、香、味”調酒為出發點，將老藥罐與古老的實驗鍊金術繪畫，帶進這次的主要視覺概念

title: Soumkine Notebooks
description:
For almost 20 years I work as an illustrator and graphic designer. 
Each new project starts with sketches in my notebooks. To record any idea you need a good support to write or sketch out.

Over this time I have tried all kinds of notebooks; everything from cheap school notepads to premium class diaries. One day I realised no notebooks existed to meet these conditions, so I created my own. The Soumkine Notebook.

Furthermore, I created a stationery company Soumkine Notebooks that focuses on high quality hand-made notebooks with premium paper.

Soumkine — It's my last name in the French manner. It pronounces as [sum’kin].

P.S. Next time I will tell more about the Soumkine identity and especially about the logo. But today I can't wait to present the last collection of "A5 Slim" notebooks. By the way, they are all available in our online shop Soumkine.com, so don't miss out!

title: Litha
description:
To mark this years transition into Midsummer I released my new print 'Litha'.

The Summer Solstice (also referred to as Litha in the Pagan calendar) marks the longest day of the year and the time when nature is in full bloom. 'Litha' embodies the plant kingdom reaching it's peak, in full fragrant abundance, an overflowing cornucopia of winding branches, sinuous leaves and unfurling flowers.

This is a limited edition print of 20 only. Signed & numbered by myself and embossed with my unique artists stamp.

title: Paul Lange
description: Responsive Web Design & Development. Since 2017 we‘ve worked together with Paul Lange on their new and refined website paullange.sk. Our goal was to redesign their website from zero and build it up on the new back-end system.

title: Sketch Sitemapping User Flow Template
description: Design sitemaps and user flows quickly in Sketch using a flexible template. Choose from over 65 layouts and page templates that will keep your sitemaps looking fresh. Connect your pages using pre-made arrows, and make it your own with annotations, descriptions, and labels. With this pre-designed but completely customizable template, you can change text styles and colors easily from a single place to apply automatically throughout the entire file.

Visit http://smart-filtration.com

title: London
description:
First and foremost: I am not a type designer per se. I create fonts only in order to incorporate them to my designs.

Nevertheless, I have been often required to release them as functional fonts; so much that I had to give in, and I've started converting some.

London is the first one. It is inspired by and based upon the classic Bodoni (Black MT), with major adjustments on the loops, ears, spurs and overall width.

title: Gin Gin, Slovakia's premium spirit
description:
Gin Gin is a new premium spirit coming from the heart of Europe – Slovakia. 
The basis of the gin is found in seven main ingredients –  Limeflower, Elderflower, Breckland Thyme, Juniper Berries, Gentian, Quince and Norwegian Angelica.
Gin is available in selected retail locations in Slovakia, follow the brand on the website and instagram for more information on availability in online stores.

title: Google Admob Business Kit
description: The Business Kit is a guide for entrepreneurial developers to turn their app into a successful business. It has four sections packed with tips and advice from developers and industry leaders.

title: In My World
description:
One in four of us will be affected by mental or neurological disorders at some point in our lives. These illnesses are exacerbated for people living in adverse conditions like severe poverty, conflict and war. In these communities, treatment is scarce and the ill are often stigmatized or worse, imprisoned for fear of their affliction.

For the In My World campaign, Witness Change founder and acclaimed photographer, Robin Hammond, traveled to Lebanon, South Sudan, Togo and Madagascar to document the stories of people living in environments that compromise their mental health, from prisons and refugee camps to impoverished and war-torn communities.

See live site:
http://www.onedayinmyworld.com/

title: McDonald's 50 ans du Big Mac | TBWA/France
description: 2018 marks the 50th anniversary of the Big Mac and McDonald’s France invited me to take part in a commemorative campaign. title: TYPO Labs Conference Design
description: TYPO Labs font technology conference, hosted in the heart of Kreuzberg at Forum Factory. TYPO Labs is an offshoot of TYPO Berlin, dedicated to the new developments in font software creation, techniques, solutions and standards. Join our tribe of passionate font engineers, academicians, technologists and industry leaders from across the globe to learn, discuss and develop the tools and techniques that matter to you.

title: The Anatomy of Small Ear Squid
GQ瀟灑調酒2：不可能研發室
description:
「GQ瀟灑調酒2：不可能研發室」，是GQ團隊「Good Drink」(G.D.)計劃中的最新作品，與Glenfiddich格蘭菲迪酒廠獨家合作，一起找來三位年輕有為的世界級冠軍調酒師，包括GN詹佳恩、Victor楊宜賓與Jeffrey張勳進，以「不可能的調酒」為主題，將吧台變成「Why Not Lab」研發室，耗費近一年時間，創作出三款從食材、風味、香氣到質感，都充滿驚奇的手工瓶裝調酒。

J4－偽裝成茶的酒／張勳進 Jeffrey Chang  2014年World Class台灣區冠軍
V5－用喝的香水／楊宜賓 Victor Yang  2013年World Class台灣區冠軍
G6－杯子裡的早餐／詹佳恩 GN CHAN  2016年Bacardi Legacy Cocktail Competition世界冠軍

不可能研發室
在這三款全新瀟灑調酒中，三位調酒師們以來自蘇格蘭的格蘭菲迪15年單一麥芽威士忌、台灣本土釀造廠Spring Vodka的琴酒、蘭姆酒與伏特加，再加入各種天然食材與烈酒調製而成；而為了凸顯挑戰不可能的實驗精神，本次的調酒瓶身更特地找來致力於推廣綠能回收玻璃的「春池玻璃」，以超過30%的回收玻璃材質、半手工製程，訂製出實驗與時髦感兼具的全新瓶身。

以台灣三位世界級冠軍調酒師研發出不可能的“色、香、味”調酒為出發點，將老藥罐與古老的實驗鍊金術繪畫，帶進這次的主要視覺概念

title: House of Marley
description: No Bounds family of speakers, designed by MINIMAL for House of Marley. Rugged, dust-proof, and waterproof, they’re crafted with mindfully sourced materials to reflect House of Marley’s mission of creating earth-friendly and socially responsible products.
